alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 12:07PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in the valleys and 5 to 9 inches at higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Intense snow showers Friday afternoon and evening will cause very low visibility and rapidly changing conditions. * WHERE...Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
